Description: SHIPPING & INSURANCE IS INCLUDED IN THE BUY IT NOW PRICE FOR EASY CALCULATION usually $160.00 ~ $210.00 USD*** GUITAR HAS FINISH DAMAGE!!! *** READ & LOOK CAREFULLY *** SOLD AS IS ***Here is a ultra rare 1994 Patrick Eggle Tony Iommi Black Sabbath Signature guitar for sale! Mahogany body & neck, 24 fret ebony fretboard w/ cross inlays, all black finish w/ cross inlay on the top of the body, original Seymour Duncan made Tony Iommi pick ups w/ vol-vol- neck pu tone controls + 3 way pu selector switch, sperzel locking tuners, guitar weighs 3.75 kilos on my digital scale, clean OHSC w/ key & warranty card included! This 24+ year old vintage guitar has been played w/ some scratches, tiny dings & dimples, finish chip at the top edge of the headstock, has a tune o matic bridge but original is included (no mods - easy swap out - see pics), some fret wear, some wear on the input jack & hardware due to age & use, this guitar has FINISH DAMAGES on both sides of the headstock/neck area - I had a pro luthier inspect the guitar and was told its just a finish damage, previous owner played this guitar like this without any issues for the past 5 years (no guarantee as I am not a luthier). Overall condition 8+/10 due to finish damage *** I am not a vintage specialist, luthier or a guitar shop *** Please look at all the pics carefully for exact condition, details & originality *** I do not have any other info or history of this guitar, so please don't ask. Google for exact spec & additional info! ****** I HAVE DESCRIBED THE DETAILS OF THIS VINTAGE USED GUITAR TO THE BEST OF MY KNOWLEDGE *** PLEASE ASK ALL QUESTIONS, LOOK AT ALL THE PICS, JUDGE and DECIDE FOR YOURSELF BEFORE PURCHASE *** SALE IS FINAL / NO CLAIMS or RETURNS / SOLD AS IS *** IMMEDIATE PAYMENT BY PAYPAL ONLY *** ALL RUDE MESSAGES WILL BE REPORTED TO EBAY IMMEDIATELY AND WILL AUTOMATICALLY BE ON MY BID BLOCK LIST PERMANENTLY *** *** I will ONLY ship to your VERIFIED/CONFIRMED paypal address *** I will pack this guitar very well in a heavy duty guitar box, and ship by EMS(express mail service) fully insured through Japan post to your Postal carrier *** Delivery time varies depending on your location and how fast the customs in your country will clear the item (usually 4-7 days to USA) *** Declared value will be the insurance value ****** USA buyers have not been taxed so far ****** ALL TAXES, CUSTOMS FEES, or IMPORT DUTIES ARE BUYERS RESPONSIBILITY *** THESE CHARGES WILL BE COLLECTED BY CUSTOMS IN YOUR COUNTRY BEFORE OR ON DELIVERY *** PLEASE CHECK WITH YOUR LOCAL TAX LAWS & REGULATIONS REGARDING THIS MATTER *** *** I will not be responsible for any damages occurred during transit as I do not have any control over the handling of the package *** If a claim does arise, I will assist you 100% with insurance claim! *** I will ship within 24-48 Hours after receiving payment in full *** I will send all EMS tracking information right after the item has been shipped *** Thanks for looking!!!
Title: 1994 PATRICK EGGLE TONY IOMMI BLACK SABBATH SIGNATURE GUITAR ULTRA RARE!!!
